summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 66E, Page 160 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 3, Hillman City Addition to the City of Seattle, Division No. 1 from RD 5000 to CG. (C.F. 286343, Petition of Joe and Shirley Yaba).
